bug.author: aboustati
bug.description: Hi, Whenever I try to optimize a model using Adam, I get the following error: FailedPreconditionError: Attempting to use uninitialized value beta1_power This happens when I run my own models, as well as when I run GPflow tests and notebooks. All other optimizers work perfectly fine. Any ideas on what is causing this? Thanks!

comments.comment: After further invesitgation, I found that this issue is caused by incompatibility with Tensorflow version 1.6. I am going to keep this issue open for now so that the devs aware of this problem. Thanks
Hello <denchmark-link:https://github.com/aboustati>@aboustati</denchmark-link> ! We are well aware of this issue, will fix it soon.Thanks!
